short_summary: The Dallaire Centre of Excellence for Peace and Security (COE) provides expertise and capacity to inform the Canadian Armed Force’s operational requirements to address complex peace and security issues through research and professional-based analysis, expertise and best practices to contribute to policy and concept development, doctrine, military training and education, and related personnel-readiness enablers. To fulfill this mandate, the COE requires expert analyses in the form of Research Papers as specified in this Statement of Work.
description: a request from the Canadian Defense Academy for key Research Papers related to military sciences and research
duration_in_months: That the tender is expected to close on 2023-10-20

#### Contact Information

* Name: Jameson Wood
* Email: Jameson.Wood@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 422-4789
* Address: 2 Ridout Sq., Kingston, ON, Canada K7K 7B4

#### Background Information

The Canadian Defence Academy, as part of the Dallaire Centre of Excellence for Peace and Security (COE), is seeking research papers to inform complex peace and security issues through expert analysis. This tender announcement is now expired, but the request for proposal remains available for	view on the purchase website. THIS FORM AND SUBMISSION TO BE CONSIDERED MUST HAVE BEEN FIXED ON 2023-10-20 PRIOR TO 17:00:00. Since the call has NOW EXPIRED,
